divs: Sighting Detailswell we have 5 boxers one chiwinner one half boxer half hound in our family.It was getting to be about weewe time for them so out the door they went. I always go out with them. To make sure they stay on our land, and that is a choure. well i started looking up at the stars cause of the meteorites. ten minutes went by and thought i need to put them inside and grab my binos. i came back out with binos in hand and strated looking at some pretty lights in the sky when a strange light caght my right eye it was gold in color thou it did have red lights on aft at the pie cut out and made absolutly no noise. This veihical past by twice in 20minutes I went and woke up my teen age son for a wetness but it never came back.there are a lot of things i left out but if it becomes importent call me and i will fill you in. thanks for being here!
